mapper.select:
select * from( select *, ifnull((select count(id) from charging_pile_info cpi where cpi.charging_stations_id = charging_stations.id and cpi.ac_dc=1 and cpi.off_line_is=0),0) as ac_online_num, ifnull((select count(id) from charging_pile_info cpi where cpi.charging_stations_id = charging_stations.id and cpi.ac_dc=1 and cpi.off_line_is=1),0) as ac_offline_num, ifnull((select count(id) from charging_pile_info cpi where cpi.charging_stations_id = charging_stations.id and cpi.ac_dc=1),0) as ac_num, ifnull((select count(id) from charging_pile_info cpi where cpi.charging_stations_id = charging_stations.id and cpi.ac_dc=2 and cpi.off_line_is=0),0) as dc_online_num, ifnull((select count(id) from charging_pile_info cpi where cpi.charging_stations_id = charging_stations.id and cpi.ac_dc=2 and cpi.off_line_is=1),0) as dc_offline_num, ifnull((select count(id) from charging_pile_info cpi where cpi.charging_stations_id = charging_stations.id and cpi.ac_dc=2),0) as dc_num
,( 6378.137 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{dimensionality})) * COS(RADIANS(dimensionality)) * COS( RADIANS(longitude) - RADIANS(#{longitude}) ) + SIN(RADIANS(#{dimensionality})) * SIN(RADIANS(dimensionality)) ) ) AS distance
from charging_stations) as chargingStation
is_deleted=0
and (chargingStation.station_name like '${stationName}%' or chargingStation.station_details like '${stationName}%')
and chargingStation.province like '${province}%'
and chargingStation.city like '${city}%'
and chargingStation.county like '${county}%'
and chargingStation.have_parking_fee = #{haveParkingFee}
and (chargingStation.open_start_time >#{openStartTime} and chargingStation.open_end_time <#{openEndTime})
and chargingStation.has_a_gun_status = #{hasAGunStatus}
and (chargingStation.distance>= #{startDistance} and chargingStation.distance<= #{endDistance} )
and chargingStation.id in (${chargingStationsIds})
and chargingStation.id = #{id}
order by chargingStation.distance asc

select cs.id,cs.station_name, (select count(id) from charging_pile_info cpi where cpi.charging_stations_id=cs.id and date(cpi.create_time)=date(now())) as stationDayOrder,
(select count(id) from charging_pile_info cpi where cpi.charging_stations_id=cs.id and DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() , '%Y%m' )) as stationMonthOrder from charging_stations cs
and cs.id =#{id}
and cs.station_name like '${stationName}%'
order by id desc
